Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to allowing patrons to remove alcohol from a licensed premises in a leisure and recreation district
Summary: Relates to allowing patrons to remove alcohol from any holder of a license to sell beer, cider, liquor, or wine at retail for consumption off the premises if the licensed premises is located within a leisure and recreation district and the patron remains within the boundaries of the leisure and recreation district.
LawCode: Amd §§106 & 3, ABC L; add §72-s, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the alcoholic beverage control law and the general municipal law, in relation to allowing patrons to remove alcohol from a licensed premises in a leisure and recreation district
